content: matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved instructions to start with c1 daffodil yellow magic_ring round 1 chain 1 12 double_crochet into the ring join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off 12 double_crochet round 2 join c2 peach orange to any double_crochet of last round chain 1 1 popcorn st in same st alternatively you can join with a standing double_crochet and make your first popcorn that way chain 2 1 popcorn st in next st chain 2 11 times join with a slip_stitch to first popcorn st fasten_off 12 popcorn sts 12 x chain 2 space round 3 join c3 pistachio green with a standing double_crochet video help of how to make a standing double crochet https //youtu be/me51dql8tpy to any chain 2 space of last round 2 double_crochet in same space skip next st popcorn st 3 double_crochet in next chain 2 space skip next st popcorn st 11 times join with a slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off 36 double_crochet round 4 join c1 daffodil yellow with a standing single_crochet video help of how to make a standing single crochet https //youtu be/u8_njvr30vs to any space between the 3 double_crochet groups 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts note the single_crochet between the 3 double_crochet groups might hide the first st 1 single_crochet in space between the 3 double_crochet groups 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 11 times join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 48 single_crochet round 5 join c3 pistachio green with a standing treble_crochet video help of how to make a standing treble crochet https //youtu be/tri1jmcxv94 to any single_crochet between the 3 double_crochet groups chain 2 2 treble_crochet in same st corner 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 treble_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet in next st corner 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 3 times 1 treble_crochet in first corner join with a slip_stitch to first treble_crochet fasten_off 12 single_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 16 double_crochet 16 treble_crochet 4 x chain 2 space round 6 join c2 peach orange with a standing single_crochet to any chain 2 space 1 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in same space corner 1 single_crochet in each st on side 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet in chain 2 space corner 1 single_crochet in each st on side 3 times join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off weave in all ends block the finished square 76 single_crochet 4 x chain 2 space 3 k a m e crochet designs 2022 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved thank you for choosing this pattern for your project when you make it i d like to see it remember to tag me @k a m e_crochet or use hashtag #kamecrochet on instagram you can also
